newsitem.title: USA: Miller Industries rises after Forbes mention.
newsitem.headline: Miller Industries rises after Forbes mention.

text.p: Shares of Miller Industries Inc rose to a new year high after it was mentioned in Forbes magazine as one of the best 200 small companies.
The stock was up 1-1/8 to 25-1/2 at midday and touched a new year high of 26 during intraday trading.

In its November 4 issue, Forbes ranked the company number nine and credited chairman William Miller for the company's five-year average return on equity of 47 percent, low manufacturing costs, and higher operating margins of 9.7 percent.
